name: Lonely Camel
description:
4 friends want to make a stupid experiment: to bring a camel to the mountain, the complete opposite of it's natural environment. That plan fails, so everyone starts arguing "who's fault is it?"

The camel that you're in control of happens to understand human languange. But an animal is an animal, so it cannot use words to communicate. This leaves you with 2 options to respond to every situation: Yes or No.

Will you solve the conflict? Or will you mess with them? There's multiple endings, and a normal run should take around <30 minutes!

This game has been made by GameDevSeal!  You can come check out my process of making this game on youtube!
